mapper.select: /* account.selectAccount */ SELECT A.ACCOUNT_NO ,A.ACCOUNT_ID ,A.NAME ,A.EMAIL ,A.MOBILE ,A.EMAIL_CERT_FLAG ,A.MOBILE_CERT_FLAG ,A.ACCOUNT_STATUS_CODE ,A.REG_DTTM ,A.REG_IP ,A.SYS_ADMIN_FLAG ,B.PASSWORD ,B.FAILED_LOGIN_COUNT FROM PA_ACCOUNT A INNER JOIN PA_ACCOUNT_AUTH_INFO B ON A.ACCOUNT_NO = B.ACCOUNT_NO WHERE ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId}
